TopicTitle: Apparently i used up all my usage in a day!

Articles.Content:
I'm not sure how, but apparently i managed to use all my data usage in a day which meant no wifi for a month. Having the internet back is like...well...its like...its like finding a long lost relative! OK, that was an exaggeration but I almost feel as if I'm living in the lap of luxury!

Edit: I can trade Pokemon now:D

Edited July 10, 2015 by ionator
added extra bit i forgot
